Events that occurred on 15 September.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1939 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 36b.
1973 - "A Tribute to Tolkien" is published by Robert Murray in The Tablet.
1974 - The first Oxonmoot is held at The Welsh Poney, Oxford.
1977 - The Silmarillion is published.
1995 - Oxonmoot 1995 at University College.
2002 - Oxonmoot 2002 at St Antony's College.
2004 - A new Swedish translation of The Lord of the Rings, made by Erik Andersson, is published.
2006 - Oxonmoot 2006 at Somerville College.
2007 - Oxonmoot 2007 at Lady Margaret Hall.
2019 - Oxonmoot 2019 at St Antony's College.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
